cause.description:
Zombies:
They ARE real, and they ARE coming, and they DO want to eat you and your entire family!
Warn your friends and family!
Here's the tip of the moment: In case of Z-Day, grab your maces, and shotguns (but not your chainsaws!), but don't forget your gas masks and shark suits!
I, unfortunatley, could not post my monologue here. It's much too long.
1. There is an extreme threat of a Zombie Apocolypse!
2. Not enough people are prepared for the eventuality of (1)
3. Not enough people are aware of (2)
4. (1)-(3) must be changed!
cause.mission: To promote awareness of the looming threat of Zombie Hordes!
cause.name: Zombie Awareness
